A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the worst movies I've watched for a long time. I really hoped this movie would give us reasonable answers to the setups of The Force Awakens. \nThe Last Jedi does not give us answers nor deliver interesting story plots or even the most basic principles of character development and story writing. I decided for myself that I won't see the next star wars related movies and will rather watch guardians of the galaxy or the old lucas saga. Disney had the chance to impress us all but sadly decided to take the path of the least effort and maximum profit.
